text:
The issue is that the result of `findfirst` is `nothing`. It seems to have something to do with 'namespacing', i.e.
```> tosymbol.(dvs)
[:decay1₊x, :decay1₊f, :decay2₊x]```
but
```> tosymbol(var_from_nested_derivative(eq.lhs)[1])
:x```

Actually sorry that is incorrect, I got my wires crossed a bit between what I pasted in the gist and what I ran with the debugger. So
```tosymbol(var_from_nested_derivative(eq.lhs)[1])
Symbol("decay2₊x⦗t⦘")
tosymbol.(dvs)
[Symbol("decay1₊x⦗t⦘"), Symbol("decay1₊f⦗t⦘"), Symbol("decay2₊x⦗t⦘")]```
.. disregard the above.
